name: AmazingFacts
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amazing facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Purpose is to make people aware of the facts that are quite interesting. It helps in educating people about variety of things.
The features are:
It gives you random facts 
It make you aware of the things you are unknown
Helps in increasing knowledge

It works as follows,

Say "Alexa, open amazing facts" and it opens the facts skill and the skill presents before you a fact and if you want more facts then you need to say "a fact" or "amazing fact" etc. and then it closes automatically.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
